name: MixedRealityToolkit-Unity for Unity 2017.1.2
body:
Release of the Mixed Reality Toolkit for [Unity 2017.1.2](https://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-2017.1.2)
Minimum Editor Compatibility for Unity 5.6

# [Upgrade Guide](/UpgradeGuide.md)

**Attention!** 
- When upgrading to this release, delete _all_ toolkit folders before importing the package.
- This release is not for Windows Mixed Reality HMDs.  Please use the Dev branch pre-releases instead.
- When building for HoloLens be sure to target the 10.0.15063 SDK.

# Release Notes
- (#1101) Updated Raycasting logic
- (#1141, #1098) Ported Input Updates from Dev Branch
- (#1106) Updated Medical Example

Breaking Changes from last release [v1.2017.1.2]()
---
- `TryGetPosition` is now `TryGetPointerPosition`
- `TryGetOrientation` is now `TryGetPointerRotation`
- `SpeechKeywordRecognizedEventData` is now `SpeechEventData`
- All other changes should throw `Obsolete` warnings with suggested updates.

name: MixedRealityToolkit-Unity for Unity 2017.2.0f3 MRTP
body:
Pre Release of the HoloToolkit for [Unity 2017.2.0f3 MRTP](http://beta.unity3d.com/download/edcd66fb22ae/download.html)
What's new for the [Fall Creators Update](/FallCreatorsUpdate.md)

# [Upgrade Guide](/UpgradeGuide.md)

**Attention!** 
- When upgrading to this release, delete _all_ toolkit folders before importing the package.
- This release is for Windows Mixed Reality HMDs only.
    - HoloLens Developers please continue to use the master branch release.
- This is the last Pre-Release for the Dev branch and is used to help mitigate the breaking changes back to master.  Please use this release as a reference point before switching to the main release.

# Release Notes
- (#828, #1057, #1059, #1060, #1064, #1069, #1072, #1075, #1081, #1082, #1091, #1093, #1089, #1175) Merged all changes from master branch into the development branch.
- (#1016, #1026, #1053, #1052, #1062, #1028, #1085, #1088, #1100) Synced the Input System and Utilities feature areas to make older projects forwards compatible.
- (#1122) Fixed issue with TeleportMarker
- (#1021) Added Motion Controllers Example

# Breaking Changes from last pre-release [v1.Dev.2017.2.0](https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/releases/tag/v1.Dev.2017.2.0)
- Moved `InteractionSourceExtensions` into the Input feature folder.
- fixed spelling in `ICurosr.SetVisibility` was `SetVisiblity`
- `RegisterPointableCanvas` is now obsolete.
- `GazeManager.UpdateHitDetails(FocusDetails focusDetails, bool isRegisteredForFocus)` is now `UpdateHitDetails(FocusDetails focusDetails, RaycastHit hitInfo, bool isRegisteredForFocus)`
- `DebugInteractionSourceState` public fields are now PascalCase.
- `FocusManager.BorrowPointerEventData()` is now `GetPointerEventData()`
- Removed `SpecularHightlight.shader`
- Marked `StartAwareBehaviour` obsolete.
- Marked `StartAwareSingleton` obsolete.

name: MixedRealityToolkit-Unity for Unity 2017.1.2f1
body:
Latest Release of the HoloToolkit for [Unity 2017.1.2f1](https://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-2017.1.2)

**Attention!** 
- When upgrading to this release, delete _all_ toolkit folders before importing the package.
- This release is not for Windows Mixed Reality HMDs.  Please use the Dev branch pre-releases instead.

# Release Notes
- (#1096) Updated Editor to 2017.1.2f1
- (#975) Added backwards support for Unity 5.6
- (#983) Fixed cross platform serialization issues
- (#936, #994, #1052, #1062) Xbox Controller Support
- (#981) Build and Deploy Updates
- (#998) Fixed Speech keyword editor assignment issues
- (#989) Added cursor offset to TapToPlace
- (#980) Fixed race condition for re-connection in `AutoJoinSessionAndRoom`
- (#985) Adds the option to download the Sharing Service executable from this repository
- (#1069) Fixed IP max character length for IPv4 addresses
- (#1075) Fixed anchor name assignment
- (#1056) Fixed `WorldAnchorManager` start inheritance
- (#1090) Removed MicStream from core folders until it passes WACK
- (#1059, #1079, #1072, #1085, #1091, #1093) Prep project for forward compatibility to 2017.2

# Breaking Changes
- Renamed feature folders
- Merged Test and Example folders
- Removed MicStream scripts and libraries until they pass WACK

name: 2017.2 Pre Release
body: This tag is for the pre-merge of the master branch into the 2017.2 dev branch.

name: MixedRealityToolkit-Unity for Unity 2017.1.1f1
body:
Latest Release of the HoloToolkit for [Unity 2017.1.1f1](https://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-2017.1.1)

- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/854) Fixed UAudioManager Editor Bug and added Test Scene for UAudioManager.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/852, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/864) `CameraCache` utility that replaces `Camera.main`.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/888, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/929) Update Editor to 2017.1.1f1 for Security Update & VS 2017 15.3 compatibility.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/874, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/924) Refactored `TapToPlace`.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/904) Fixed 3dText multi pass and single pass stereo rendering. 
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/887, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/955) Updated and refactored Editor Utilities.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/930) Fixed mismatched Mic network stream.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/747) Added persistent keyword capability.
    - Removed obsolete warnings from scene loader.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/927, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/935) Added confidence level to keywords.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/905, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/960) Added some Enhanced 3D primitives.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/965) Fixed IL2CPP build errors.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/931, https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/967) Fixed and updated example scenes.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/962) Fixed Quality Settings regression.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/742) Update to WorldAnchorManager and added MultiLens capabilities.

# Breaking Changes
- `GameObjects` that utilize the `WorldAnchorStore` need to have unique names.
    - This is important so you can spawn identical objects across the network without needing to know the anchor names ahead of time.

name: MixedRealityToolkit-Unity for Unity 2017.1.0f3
body:
Latest release of the HoloToolkit for [Unity 2017.1.0f3](https://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-2017.1.0)

Repository Branding Updated to MixedRealityToolkit-Unity. 

- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/728) Improvements for `ImportExportAnchorManager`.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/492) Fixed uNet issues with the server broadcasting when building as master.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/752) `SpawnManager` Update.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/776) Build & Deploy tools fixed determining Visual Studio instance.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/765) Added 3d keyboard.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/717) Fixes to SpatialUnderstandingExample scene.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/733) Added a basic Application View Manager to Popup and return a value.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/764) Added medical volumetric rendering example.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/810) Replaced all project shaders with Fast Configurable Shader.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/805) Fixed Updated `GazeManager` uGUI raycast calculations & `GazeTransform` initialization.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/827) Minor Refactoring and Cleanup.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/pull/839) Fixed issue with mesh cursor light not being deactivated properly.

name: HoloToolkit-Unity for Unity MRTP13 with Windows Mixed Reality support
body:
Updating Dev_Unity_2017.2.0 branch to final MRTP13 build 
Updated feature:
- Merged glTF Crystal Key motion controller rendering code.
- No API changes or breaking changes.

Top Unity known issue:
• Gamepad input doesn't work if Holographic HMD has focus during
playmode [925608]

name: HoloToolkit-Unity for Unity MRTP9 with Windows Mixed Reality support
body:
Current Unity Editor Project Version: 
Early access 5.6.1f1-MRTP9 Not accessible broadly yet.
Eventual release target is Unity 2017.2, but we wanted some managed partners to have access to this build.

Prerequisites:
Please see ReadME.md for setup steps.

What's new for Immersive headsets in this branch?
- GamepadInput supports the Xbox controller and maps it to the input manager events. You can use the Xbox controller A to tap. Press A and hold to do hold started, canceled and completed. Press A and left joystick to trigger the navigation events. Press the Y button to teleport in your world. Press the B button to return back to your original location.

- Motion Controller support that renders a prefab where you have the Crystal Key motion controller in your hand. Refer to MotionControllerTest.unity scene for how to use the scripts.

- Teleport capability with new prefabs like MixedRealityCameraParent.prefab that help you teleport to different locations in your app using the gamepad.

- Stage folder has the scripts that support the StageRoot component that helps define the 0,0,0 for your immersive applications. Prefabs help to draw the floor for immersive headsets and also renders the stage bounds if you wish to display those in your application.

name: HoloToolkit-Unity for Unity 5.6.2f1
body:
Latest release of the HoloToolkit for [Unity 5.6.2f1](https://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/unity-5.6.2)

- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/677) Implementing unit tests for TransformPoint and Inverse.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/679) Added WindowsStoreApp to local .gitignore file.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/682) Updated serialized meshMaterial field.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/702, https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/727) Updated `TapToPlace.cs`
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/689, https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/715) Added a scene launcher for easily switching between various HoloToolkit scenes.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/533, https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/721, https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/716) Updates to Dictation, Speech, and MicStream.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/664) Added a Tile & Splashscreen generator.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/736) Updated billboard to use a target transform.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/732) Updated global listener namespace.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/740) Added Cross Platform compatibility for Android, iOS, and PC
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/750) Updated Input Manger Tests scene light settings.
- (https://github.com/Microsoft/HoloToolkit-Unity/pull/714) Updated and fixed Build & Deploy tools.

name: HoloToolkit-Unity for Unity 5.5.2f1+
body:
Latest release of the HoloToolkit for Unity 5.5.2f1

Release Notes:
- Fixes to Sharing Services
- Updated Spatial Understanding libraries
- Moved Test scenes into their own top level folder with it's own asset package
- Updated 3d text components and shaders
- Updated Editor Input to handle manipulation and navigation events
- Fixed Spatial Mapping colliders
- Updated Spatial Mapping to use unscaled time
- Updates to World Anchor Manager
- Cursor logic fixes

Upcoming releases:
- Unity 5.6+
- Windows Mixed Reality

name: HoloToolkit-Unity for Unity 5.5.0f3+
body:
Release Notes:
1. Includes new Extensible Input System.
2. Master Moved to Unity Engine 5.5.0f3.
3. Updated HoloLens Project Configuration Wizard.
4. Spatial Mapping Namespace updated and assets organized.
5. Shaders now support stereo instancing and near clip fading.
6. Will also provide a release version Unity package in the External\Unitypackages folder.

Breaking Changes:
1. No Longer compatible with Unity technical preview builds.
   - Please use latest engine release from Unity.
2. All Input Systems updated to new Extensible Input System.

name: HoloToolkit-Unity Thanksgiving release compatible with Unity 5.4
body:
Release notes:
1. Creating a release off of master before taking any breaking changes.
2. Contains all the contributions since HoloToolkit first launched on 30th March 2016.
3. Release works with Unity 5.4 releases.
4. This will allow developers to sync to a known point in time.
5. It will help with a better versioning story.

Upcoming releases:
1. Merge ExtensibleInputModule breaking change branch into master.
2. Move master to Unity 5.5 builds.

Thank you for your contributions and Happy Thanksgiving :)
